title: Silver’s Torrid Rally Has Americans in Frenzy to Buy, Sell Coins
description: The last time silver was this hot, Reddit posters piled in to drive prices even higher, creating a frenzy that overwhelmed dealers. The metal’s current rally has set off a similar dynamic.
content: The last time silver was this hot, Reddit posters piled in to drive prices even higher, creating a frenzy that overwhelmed dealers. The metal’s current rally has set off a similar dynamic.
